resources.string: For testing the display of your phone, press the START TEST button. To go to the next color, click on the screen.
The following colors will be used for the test:
Version for WEAR OS and Android TV
This function will be implemented in future versions

The application is designed to check the devices screen for broken pixels.

Do the following:

1. Click the START TEST button.
2. Carefully inspect the entire surface of the screen for the presence of different in color pixels after running the test.
3. Click on the screen to change the color.
4. Repeat the inspection.
